parameters.description:

If language is not present in the request it will return the custom content from playerâ€™s registration language. If registration language does not exist, it will return the content for the default system language. If custom content for default system language does not exist, then only content for _ANY_ language is present.

parameters.description: Flag to also include player bonuses from history table (player bonuses in final state and older than 2 weeks). Default value is true (configurable - BonusMgmt.GetPlayerBonuses.DefaultIncludeHistory).

200.description:
Login User and Returns login data.
            
Login data contains player popup messages. Each message contains Title, message content(body) and actions.
            
Action is basically a button with action id and Button name - text to be displayed on button. There can be several popup actions (Accept, Decline, Yes, No, Cancel....and others), each of this actions - button has its own ID created by IGS. When player clicks certain button, action - callback should be performed.

get.description:
# Get player details
            
The method will return data for the current player with the exception of custom parameters.
            
This is the same method as the GET /api/portal/v1/player/Data method with the only difference that it does not return custom parameters (i.e. It always returns NULL on custom parameters, regardless of their actual values).
            
# Errors
            
Error code                  | Description
--------------------------- | -----------
`PlayerNotFound`            | Player not found.
`PlayerSessionCheckFailed`  | Checking player session failed.
`InternalError`             | Internal error.

200.description: Return player with players data and details

post.description:
# Logout
            
The method will close the player session on the backend and therefore make the currently supplied JWT invalid for future use.
After calling this method, the client must not use the currently supplied JWT for any other future requests.
            
# Errors
            
Error code                  | Description
--------------------------- | -----------
`PlayerSessionCheckFailed`  | Checking player session failed.
`InternalError`             | Internal error.

200.description: Player is logged out.

post.description:
# Change forgotten password
            
This method is used by the player to change a forgotten password.
            
**IMPORTANT: client implementation is responsible for assuring password complexity.**
            
`SecureKey` should be received by the player via email after executing `player/password/forgot`
            
# Errors
            
Error code                    | Description
----------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------
`ChangePasswordTokenNotFound` | The secure token, which was supposed to be received via email, is incorrect.
`InternalError`               | Internal error

200.description: Changes the player's password

post.description:
# Set player limits
            
This method sets new player limit.
            
A player shall be able to set his personal gambling limits on a special â€œLimitsâ€ page or at the â€œLimitsâ€ section of â€œMy accountâ€ page.
Players shall be able to set the following limits:
- Game Session duration limit,
- Total wager (for the session, day, or week period),
-	Maximum single bet amount,
-	Total lost (for the session, day, or week period),
-	Deposit limit.
            
# Errors
            
Error code                      | Description
------------------------------- | -----------
`PlayerSessionCheckFailed`      | Checking player session failed.
`InvalidLimitData`              | Provided limit data is invalid.
`PlayerNotFound`                | Player not found.
`RGLThresholdLessRestrictive`   | Limit exceeded the maximum limit.
`InternalError`                 | Internal error.

200.description: Returns success status and sets player limit.

To get a list of all player's set limits, use player/limits

# Validate player data
            
This method allows data validation for input fields on registration page (username, email, bonus code).

get.description:
# Refer a friend statistic
            
The method returns statistics on player referrals to friends - refer a friend functionality. This functionality means that players send invitations to other people who are not yet registered and could be.
            
# Errors
            
Error code                  | Description
--------------------------- | -----------
`PlayerSessionCheckFailed`  | Checking player session failed.
`InternalError`             | Internal error.
`PlayerNotFound`            | Player not found.

200.description: Returns statistics on player referrals to friends.

post.summary: Refers a friend of the player.
post.description:
# Refer a friend
            
Refer a friend functionality allows players to send invites to other people which are not yet registered and could potentially. Currently iCore supports SMS and EMAIL type of invites.
            
# Errors
            
Error code                  | Description
--------------------------- | ----------------------
`PlayerSessionCheckFailed`  | Checking player session failed.
`Security`                  | Player id and secure token mismatch.
`InternalError`             | internal error.
`RequestValidationError`    | One or more referees are invalid.
`UnusedQuotaExceeded`       | Daily quota of invites sent is exceeded.

200.description: Request successfully executed and the referral messages should be sent

put.description:

This method sets the time/date until when player is timed out.
            
# Errors

To get the message on preLaunchGame following configuration steps need to be made:
* Configure bonus where only a subset of games(e.g.only Habanero games) contribute toward wagering requirements 
* Launch a game that does not contribute towards wagering requirements.
*	The following notification due to the pregame launch check is shown before the game is launched

productType.description: Product type for which bonus the balance is applicable.

numWageredRequirement.description: Number of required bonus wagering bets

totalNumWagered.description: Number of successful bets already made at the bonus wagering

paymentInstrumentId.description: Payment instrument id: 22 â€“ LocalBankTransfer(bank accounts)

internalPlayerRestricted.description: If true internal players cannot use the product

externalPlayerRestricted.description: If true, external players cannot use the product

unknownPlayerRestricted.description: If true, unknown players cannot use the product

maintenanceModeEnabled.description: If true, maintenance mode is enabled

realPlayRestricted.description: If true, real play is restricted

demoPlayRestricted.description: If true, demo play is restricted

bonusFriendlyName.description: Bonus friendly name in iCore configuration

triggerType.description:
Trigger type
Possible values:
* Deposit
* Wager
* Loss
* NewPaymentMethod
* Win
* ChangeOfVipLevel
* Transfer
* MarketingPoints
* Event

amount.description: Amount data (present only for trigger types where min and max values are defined)

thresholdValue.description: Treshold value to meet condition criteria (present only when min and max values are not defined)

paymentMethodIDs.description: List of payment instrument ids for which condition is applicable (only present for Deposit and NewPaymentMethod trigger types)

includedVIPlevelsIDs.description: List of VIP level ids for which condition is applicable (present only for ChangeOfVipLevel trigger type)

playerFulfillmentLeft.description: Player fulfillment amount left to satisfy awarding condition

currentDepositNumber.description: Current deposit number counter (present only for Deposit trigger type)

BetStatusEnum.description:
Bet status type
Possible values:
* None,
* Placed,
* Running,
* CashOut,
* PartialCashOut,
* Won,
* Lost,
* HalfWon,
* HalfLost,
